package db;

import javax.swing.JOptionPane;

import module.User;
import view.LoginFrame;

public class DAOuser
{
  static User arruser[];
  static int count ;
  
    static
    {
    	arruser=new User[3];
    	count=0;
    }

	public boolean insert(User u1) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	try {
		arruser[count]=u1;
		count++;
		for(int i=0;i<arruser.length;i++)
			System.out.println(arruser[i]);
		return true;
	}catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException e) {
		// TODO: handle exception
	System.out.println("Regisration Full");
		return false;
	} catch (Exception e) {
		// TODO: handle exception
		e.printStackTrace();
		return false;
	}

	}

	public User validateuser(User u1) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	
		int flag=0;
		for(int i=0;i<arruser.length;i++)
		{
		if(u1.getUsername().contentEquals(arruser[i].getUsername())&&u1.getPassword().contentEquals(arruser[i].getPassword()))
		{
			System.out.println("equal");
			u1.setCity(arruser[i].getCity());
			flag=1;
			break;
		}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		{
			return u1;
		}
		else
		{
			return null;
		}

	}
	public boolean checklength() {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if(arruser.length==0)
		{
			return true;
		}
		else
		{
			return false;
		}
	}

	
}
